agent_runner.hint: Select the runner for AI conversations. Defaults to AstrBot's built-in Agent runner, which supports knowledge base, persona, and tool calling features. You don't need to modify this section unless you plan to integrate third-party Agent runners like Dify or Coze.

dashscope_agent_runner_provider_id.description: Alibaba Cloud Bailian Application Agent Runner Provider ID

ai.hint: When using non-built-in Agent runners, the default chat model and default image caption model may not take effect, but some plugins rely on these settings to invoke AI capabilities.

default_provider_id.hint: Uses the first model when left empty

fallback_chat_models.hint: When the primary chat model request fails, fallback to these chat models in order.

default_image_caption_provider_id.hint: Leave empty to disable; useful for non-multimodal models

provider_id.hint: Users can also select session-specific STT models using the /provider command.

kb_fusion_top_k.hint: Number of results returned after fusing search results from multiple knowledge bases

kb_final_top_k.hint: Number of results retrieved from the knowledge base. Higher values may provide more relevant information but could also introduce noise. Adjust based on actual needs

kb_agentic_mode.hint: When enabled, knowledge base retrieval becomes an LLM Tool, allowing the model to autonomously decide when to query the knowledge base. Requires the model to support function calling.

websearch_tavily_key.hint: Multiple keys can be added for rotation.

websearch_bocha_key.hint: Multiple keys can be added for rotation.

websearch_baidu_app_builder_key.description: Baidu Qianfan Smart Cloud APP Builder API Key

agent_computer_use.hint: Allows the AstrBot to access and use your computer or an sandbox environment to perform more complex tasks. See [Sandbox Mode](https://docs.astrbot.app/use/astrbot-agent-sandbox.html), [Skills](https://docs.astrbot.app/use/skills.html)

computer_use_runtime.hint: sandbox means running in a sandbox environment, local means running in a local environment, none means disabling Computer Use. If skills are uploaded, choosing none will cause them to not be usable by the Agent.

computer_use_require_admin.hint: When enabled, AstrBot admin permission is required to use computer capabilities. Admins can be added in Platform Config. Use the /sid command to view admin IDs.

shipyard_endpoint.hint: API access address for Shipyard service.

shipyard_access_token.hint: Access token for accessing Shipyard service.

shipyard_max_sessions.hint: Maximum number of Shipyard sessions an instance can handle.

proactive_capability.hint: AstrBot will wake up, run your tasks, and deliver the results to you. See [Proactive Agent](https://docs.astrbot.app/en/use/proactive-agent.html)

add_cron_tools.hint: When enabled, related tools will be passed to the Agent to implement proactive Agent capabilities. You can tell AstrBot what to do at a future time, and it will be triggered on schedule to execute the task, and report the result back to you.

max_context_length.hint: Discards the oldest parts when this count is exceeded. One conversation round counts as 1, -1 means unlimited

dequeue_context_length.hint: Number of conversation turns to discard at once when maximum context length is exceeded

context_limit_reached_strategy.description: Handling When Model Context Window is Exceeded
context_limit_reached_strategy.hint: When 'Truncate by Turns' is selected, the oldest N conversation turns will be discarded based on the 'Dequeue Conversation Turns' setting above. When 'Compress by LLM' is selected, the specified model will be used for context compression.

llm_compress_instruction.hint: If empty, the default prompt will be used.

llm_compress_keep_recent.hint: Always keep the most recent N turns of conversation when compressing context.

llm_compress_provider_id.description: Model Provider ID for Context Compression
llm_compress_provider_id.hint: When left empty, will fall back to the 'Truncate by Turns' strategy.

llm_safety_mode.hint: Add safety guardrails to model replies.

identifier.hint: When enabled, user ID information will be included in the prompt.

group_name_display.hint: When enabled, group name information will be included in the prompt on supported platforms (OneBot v11).

datetime_system_prompt.hint: When enabled, current time information will be appended to the system prompt.

show_tool_call_result.hint: Only takes effect when "Output Function Call Status" is enabled, and shows at most 70 characters.

sanitize_context_by_modalities.hint: When enabled, sanitizes contexts before each LLM request by removing image blocks and tool-call structures that the current provider's modalities do not support (this changes what the model sees).

max_quoted_fallback_images.hint: Maximum number of images injected from forwarded-message parsing; extra images are truncated.

max_component_chain_depth.hint: Maximum recursive depth when parsing rich-text component chains inside forwarded messages.

max_forward_node_depth.hint: Maximum recursive depth when parsing nested forwarded nodes.

max_forward_fetch.hint: Maximum number of recursive get_forward_msg fetch operations.

warn_on_action_failure.hint: When enabled, log warnings when all get_msg/get_forward_msg attempts fail.

tool_schema_mode.hint: Skills-like sends name/description first and re-queries for parameters; Full sends the complete schema in one step.

unsupported_streaming_strategy.hint: Select the handling method for platforms that don't support streaming responses. Real-time segmented reply sends content immediately when the system detects segment points like punctuation during streaming reception

wake_prefix.hint: If the wake prefix is / and the additional chat wake prefix is chat, then /chat is required to trigger LLM requests

prompt_prefix.hint: You can use {{prompt}} as a placeholder for user input. If no placeholder is provided, it will be added before the user input.

reachability_check.hint: When running the /provider command, test provider connectivity in parallel. This actively pings models and may consume extra tokens.

dual_output.description: Output Both Voice and Text When TTS is Enabled

appid.hint: Required. App ID for the QQ Official Bot platform. See the docs for how to obtain it.

callback_server_host.hint: Callback server host. Leave empty to disable the callback server.

card_template_id.hint: Optional. DingTalk interactive card template ID. When enabled, streaming replies will use interactive cards.

discord_activity_name.hint: Optional Discord activity name. Leave empty to disable.

discord_command_register.description: Auto-register plugin commands as Discord slash commands

discord_token.hint: Enter your Discord Bot Token here.

enable.hint: Whether to enable this adapter. Disabled adapters will not receive messages.

enable_group_c2c.hint: When enabled, the bot can receive private chats from QQ message list. You may need to add the bot as a friend by scanning a QR code in the QQ bot platform. See docs.

enable_guild_direct_message.hint: When enabled, the bot can receive guild direct messages.

kf_name.hint: Optional. Customer service account name (not ID). Get it at https://kf.weixin.qq.com/kf/frame#/accounts

lark_bot_name.hint: Must be correct; otherwise @ mentions will not wake the bot and only prefix wake will work.

lark_encrypt_key.hint: Encryption key for decrypting Lark callback data.

lark_verification_token.hint: Token for verifying Lark callback requests.

misskey_allow_insecure_downloads.hint: If remote servers have certificate issues, SSL verification will be disabled as a fallback. Use only when necessary due to security risks.

misskey_default_visibility.hint: Default visibility for bot posts. public: public, home: home timeline, followers: followers only.

misskey_download_chunk_size.hint: Bytes read per chunk during streaming download and MD5 calculation. Too small increases overhead; too large uses more memory.

misskey_download_timeout.hint: Timeout for downloading remote files (seconds), used when falling back to local upload.

misskey_enable_chat.hint: When enabled, the bot listens and responds to private chat messages.

misskey_enable_file_upload.hint: When enabled, the adapter uploads files in message chains to Misskey. URL files try server-side upload first; if async upload fails, it falls back to local download and upload.

misskey_instance_url.hint: e.g. https://misskey.example. The Misskey instance where the bot account lives.

misskey_local_only.hint: When enabled, bot posts are visible only on this instance and are not federated.

misskey_max_download_bytes.hint: To limit download size to prevent OOM, set the maximum bytes; empty or null means no limit.

misskey_token.hint: API access token generated in the connection service settings.

misskey_upload_concurrency.hint: Max number of concurrent upload tasks (integer, default 3).

misskey_upload_folder.hint: Optional: ID of the target folder in Misskey drive. Leave empty to use the root folder.

port.hint: Callback server port. Leave empty to disable the callback server.

satori_api_base_url.hint: Base URL for the Satori API.

satori_auto_reconnect.hint: Automatically reconnect the WebSocket when disconnected.

satori_heartbeat_interval.hint: Interval in seconds between heartbeat messages.

slack_connection_mode.hint: The connection mode for Slack. `webhook` uses a webhook server, `socket` uses Slack's Socket Mode.

slack_webhook_host.hint: Only valid when Slack connection mode is `webhook`.

slack_webhook_path.hint: Only valid when Slack connection mode is `webhook`.

slack_webhook_port.hint: Only valid when Slack connection mode is `webhook`.

telegram_command_auto_refresh.hint: When enabled, AstrBot automatically refreshes Telegram commands at runtime. (Setting this alone has no effect)

telegram_command_register.hint: When enabled, AstrBot automatically registers Telegram commands.

telegram_command_register_interval.hint: Telegram command auto-refresh interval in seconds.

telegram_token.hint: If you are in mainland China, set a proxy or change api_base in Other Settings.

unified_webhook_mode.hint: When enabled, use AstrBot unified webhook entry without opening a separate port. Callback URL is /api/platform/webhook/{webhook_uuid}.

webhook_uuid.hint: Unique identifier for unified webhook mode; generated when creating the platform.

wecom_ai_bot_name.hint: Must be correct; otherwise some commands won't work.

wecomaibot_friend_message_welcome_text.description: WeCom AI Bot DM Welcome Message
wecomaibot_friend_message_welcome_text.hint: When a user enters a DM session on that day, reply with a welcome message. Leave empty to disable.

wecomaibot_init_respond_text.description: WeCom AI Bot Initial Response Text
wecomaibot_init_respond_text.hint: First reply when the bot receives a message. Leave empty to disable.

wpp_active_message_poll.hint: Only enable if WeChat messages are not syncing to AstrBot on time. Disabled by default.

wpp_active_message_poll_interval.hint: Interval in seconds, default 3, should not exceed 60 or it may be considered old messages.

ws_reverse_token.hint: Reverse WebSocket token. If not set, token verification is disabled.

msg_push_webhook_url.hint: Used for proactive message push. It is strongly recommended to set this for a better message sending experience.

only_use_webhook_url_to_send.hint: When enabled, all WeCom AI Bot replies are sent through msg_push_webhook_url. The message push webhook supports more message types (such as images, files, etc.). If you do not need the typing effect, it is strongly recommended to use this option.

unique_session.hint: When enabled, group members have independent contexts.

disable_builtin_commands.hint: Disable all built-in AstrBot commands such as help, provider, model, etc.

enable_id_white_list.hint: When enabled, only sessions in the whitelist will be responded to.

id_whitelist_log.hint: When enabled, INFO level logs will be output when a message doesn't pass the whitelist.

wl_ignore_admin_on_group.description: Administrator Group Messages Bypass ID Whitelist

wl_ignore_admin_on_friend.description: Administrator Private Messages Bypass ID Whitelist

enable.hint: You need to manually install the baidu-aip library.

extra_keywords.hint: Additional keyword blocklist, supports regular expressions.

no_permission_reply.description: Reply When User Has Insufficient Permissions

emojis.hint: Telegram only supports a fixed reaction set, reference: [https://gist.github.com/Soulter/3f22c8e5f9c7e152e967e8bc28c97fc9](https://gist.github.com/Soulter/3f22c8e5f9c7e152e967e8bc28c97fc9)

plugin_set.hint: All non-disabled plugins are enabled by default. If a plugin is disabled on the plugins page, selections here will not take effect.

interval_method.hint: random 为随机时间，log 为根据消息长度计算，$y=log_<log_base>(x)$，x为字数，y的单位为秒。

log_base.hint: Base for logarithmic intervals, defaults to 2.6. Value range: 1.0-10.0.

words_count_threshold.hint: Segmented reply word count threshold. Only messages with less than this number of words will be segmented, and messages with more than this number of words will be sent directly (not segmented).

split_mode.hint: Used to segment a message. By default, it will be separated by punctuation marks like period, question mark, etc. For example, filling `[。？！]` will remove all periods, question marks, and exclamation marks. re.findall(r'<regex>', text)

split_words.hint: Split when any word in the list is detected

content_cleanup_rule.hint: Remove specified content from segmented content. For example, `[。?!]` will remove all periods, question marks, and exclamation marks.

ltm.description: Group Chat Context Awareness (formerly Chat Memory Enhancement)

image_caption.hint: Requires setting a group chat image caption model.

image_caption_provider_id.hint: Used for image understanding in group chat context awareness, configured separately from the default image caption model.

whitelist.hint: Whitelist filtering is disabled when empty. Use /sid to get IDs.

t2i_strategy.hint: Text-to-image strategy. `remote` uses a remote HTML-based rendering service, `local` uses PIL for local rendering. When using local, place a TTF font named 'font.ttf' in the data/ directory to customize the font.

t2i_endpoint.hint: Uses AstrBot API service when empty

t2i_template.hint: When enabled, you can customize HTML templates for text-to-image rendering.

t2i_active_template.hint: This value is maintained by the text-to-image template management page.

log_file_enable.hint: Write logs to a file in addition to the console.

log_file_path.hint: Relative paths are resolved under the data directory, e.g. logs/astrbot.log; absolute paths are supported.

log_file_max_mb.hint: Rotate when exceeding this size; default 20MB.

temp_dir_max_size.hint: Limits total size of data/temp in MB. The system checks every 10 minutes, and when exceeded, deletes oldest files first to release about 30% of current size.

trace_log_enable.hint: Write trace events to a separate file (does not change console output).

trace_log_path.hint: Relative paths are resolved under the data directory, e.g. logs/astrbot.trace.log; absolute paths are supported.

trace_log_max_mb.hint: Rotate when exceeding this size; default 20MB.

pip_install_arg.hint: When installing plugin dependencies, Python's pip tool will be used. Additional arguments can be provided here, such as `--break-system-package`.

pypi_index_url.hint: PyPI repository URL for installing Python dependencies. Defaults to [https://mirrors.aliyun.com/pypi/simple/](https://mirrors.aliyun.com/pypi/simple/)

callback_api_base.hint: External services may access AstrBot's backend through callback links generated by AstrBot (such as file download links). Since AstrBot cannot automatically determine the externally accessible host address in the deployment environment, this configuration item is needed to explicitly specify how external services should access AstrBot's address. Examples: [http://localhost:6185](http://localhost:6185), [https://example.com](https://example.com), etc.

enable.hint: When enabled, WebUI serves directly over HTTPS.

cert_file.hint: Certificate file path (PEM). Supports absolute and relative paths (relative to current working directory).

key_file.hint: Private key file path (PEM). Supports absolute and relative paths (relative to current working directory).

ca_certs.hint: Optional. Path to CA certificate file.

timezone.hint: Timezone setting. Please enter an IANA timezone name, such as Asia/Shanghai. Uses system default timezone when empty. For all timezones, see: [https://data.iana.org/time-zones/tzdb-2021a/zone1970.tab](https://data.iana.org/time-zones/tzdb-2021a/zone1970.tab)

http_proxy.hint: When enabled, proxy will be set by adding environment variables. Format: `http://ip:port`

genie_onnx_model_dir.hint: The directory path containing the ONNX model files

xai_native_search.hint: When enabled, uses xAI Chat Completions native Live Search for web queries (billed on demand). Only applies to xAI providers.

rerank_api_base.hint: AstrBot appends /v1/rerank to the request URL.

rerank_api_key.hint: Leave empty if no API key is required.

return_documents.description: Return source documents in rerank results
return_documents.hint: Default is false to reduce network overhead.

instruct.hint: Only effective for qwen3-rerank models. Recommended to write in English.

launch_model_if_not_running.hint: If the model is not running in Xinference, attempt to start it automatically. Recommended to disable in production.

modalities.hint: Modalities supported by the model. If the model does not support images, uncheck image.

custom_headers.hint: Key/value pairs added here are merged into the OpenAI SDK default_headers for custom HTTP headers. Values must be strings.

custom_extra_body.hint: Add extra parameters to requests, such as temperature, top_p, max_tokens, etc.

temperature.hint: Controls randomness, typically 0-2. Higher is more random.
temperature.name: Temperature

top_p.hint: Nucleus sampling parameter, usually 0-1. Controls probability mass considered.
top_p.name: Top-p

gpt_weights_path.hint: The .ckpt file. Use an absolute path without quotes. Leave empty to use the GPT_SoVITS built-in SoVITS model (recommended to change defaults in GPT_SoVITS).

sovits_weights_path.hint: The .pth file. Use an absolute path without quotes. Leave empty to use the GPT_SoVITS built-in SoVITS model (recommended to change defaults in GPT_SoVITS).

gsv_default_parms.hint: Reference audio file path and text are required; other parameters are optional.

gsv_ref_audio_path.hint: Required! Use an absolute path without quotes.

gsv_prompt_text.hint: Required! Provide the transcript of the reference audio.

gsv_prompt_lang.hint: Language of the reference audio text; default is Chinese.

gsv_text_split_method.hint: Options: `cut0` no split, `cut1` split every 4 sentences, `cut2` split every 50 chars, `cut3` split by Chinese period, `cut4` split by English period, `cut5` split by punctuation.

gsv_split_bucket.description: Split text into buckets for parallel processing

embedding_dimensions.hint: Embedding vector dimensions. May need adjustment per model; see model documentation. This must be correct or the vector database will not work.

volcengine_cluster.hint: For voice cloning models, choose volcano_icl or volcano_icl_concurr; default is volcano_tts.

azure_tts_style.hint: A voice-specific speaking style. Can express emotions like happy, sympathetic, and calm.

azure_tts_role.hint: Speaking role-play. The voice can emulate different ages and genders without changing the voice name. For example, a male voice can raise pitch to simulate a female voice, but the voice name does not change. If the role is missing or unsupported, this attribute is ignored.

azure_tts_rate.hint: Controls speaking rate. You can apply the rate at word or sentence level. Rate should be 0.5x to 2x of original audio.

azure_tts_volume.hint: Controls volume level. You can apply changes at sentence level. Use 0.0 to 100.0 (quiet to loud, e.g., 75). Default is 100.0.

azure_tts_region.hint: Region where Azure TTS processes data. See https://learn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/azure/ai-services/speech-service/regions

azure_tts_subscription_key.hint: Azure TTS subscription key (not a token).

gm_resp_image_modal.hint: When enabled, responses can include images. Requires model support or it will error. See the Google Gemini website for supported models. Tip: if you need image generation, disable the `Enable member recognition` setting for better results.

gm_native_search.hint: When enabled, all function tools are disabled. Check official docs for free quota limits.

gm_native_coderunner.hint: When enabled, all function tools are disabled.

gm_url_context.hint: When enabled, all function tools are disabled.

gm_safety_settings.hint: Set the safety filtering level for model input. Levels: NONE (no blocking), HIGH (block high risk), MEDIUM_AND_ABOVE (block medium risk and above), LOW_AND_ABOVE (block low risk and above). See Gemini API docs.

sexually_explicit.hint: References to sexual acts or other obscene content

dangerous_content.hint: Content that promotes, encourages, or assists harmful behavior

budget.hint: Guides the model on the specific number of thinking tokens to use for reasoning. See: https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/thinking#set-budget

level.hint: Recommended for Gemini 3 models and onwards, lets you control reasoning behavior.See: https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/thinking#thinking-levels

type.hint: Set 'adaptive' for Opus 4.6+ / Sonnet 4.6+ (recommended). Leave empty to use manual budget mode. See: https://platform.claude.com/docs/en/build-with-claude/adaptive-thinking

budget.hint: Anthropic thinking.budget_tokens param. Must >= 1024. Only used when type is empty. Deprecated on Opus 4.6 / Sonnet 4.6. See: https://platform.claude.com/docs/en/build-with-claude/extended-thinking

effort.hint: Controls thinking depth when type is 'adaptive'. 'high' is the default. 'max' is Opus 4.6 only. See: https://platform.claude.com/docs/en/build-with-claude/effort

minimax-group-id.hint: Visible in Account Management -> Basic Info.

minimax-langboost.hint: Enhances recognition for specified languages/dialects and improves speech performance in those scenarios.

minimax-voice-speed.hint: Speech speed for synthesis, range [0.5, 2], default 1.0. Higher is faster.

minimax-voice-vol.hint: Volume for synthesis, range (0, 10], default 1.0. Higher is louder.

minimax-is-timber-weight.hint: Enable mixing up to four voices with custom weights. When enabled, single voice settings are ignored.

minimax-timber-weight.hint: Mixed voices and their weights. Up to four voices, integer weights in [1, 100]. Get presets and templates from the official API TTS debug console. Must be a JSON string; check the console to confirm parsing. See defaults and the official code preview for structure.

minimax-voice-id.hint: Single voice ID; see the official documentation.

minimax-voice-emotion.hint: Controls emotion of synthesized speech. When set to auto, it selects emotion based on text.

minimax-voice-latex.hint: Read LaTeX formulas, but ensure input text is formatted per the official requirements.

minimax-voice-english-normalization.hint: Improves number-reading performance but slightly increases latency.

rag_options.hint: Knowledge base retrieval settings, optional. Only supported for Agent app types (agent apps, including RAG apps). For Bailian apps, enabling this disables multi-turn conversations.

pipeline_ids.hint: Retrieve all documents in the specified knowledge bases. Go to https://bailian.console.aliyun.com/ Data Apps -> Knowledge Index to create and get IDs.

file_ids.hint: Retrieve specified unstructured documents. Go to https://bailian.console.aliyun.com/ Data Management to create and get IDs.

output_reference.hint: Append reference sources to the end of each answer. Default is False.

sensevoice_hint.hint: Before enabling, install funasr, funasr_onnx, torchaudio, torch, modelscope, and jieba (CPU by default, about 1 GB download), and install ffmpeg. Otherwise STT will not work.

stt_model.hint: Model name on modelscope. Default: iic/SenseVoiceSmall.

variables.hint: Optional. Fixed workflow input variables are used as workflow inputs. You can also set variables dynamically with /set during a chat. If names conflict, dynamic settings take precedence.

fishaudio-tts-character.hint: Fishaudio TTS character. Default is Klee. More roles: https://fish.audio/zh-CN/discovery

fishaudio-tts-reference-id.hint: Fishaudio TTS reference model ID (optional). If set, the model ID is used directly instead of looking up by role name. Example: 626bb6d3f3364c9cbc3aa6a67300a664. More models: https://fish.audio/zh-CN/discovery; open a model detail page to copy the model ID.

whisper_hint.hint: Before enabling, install the openai-whisper library (NVIDIA users download ~2GB mainly for torch and cuda; CPU users download ~1GB), and install ffmpeg. Otherwise STT will not work.

max_context_tokens.hint: Maximum context tokens. If 0, it auto-fills from model metadata (if available); you can also edit manually.

dify_api_key.hint: Dify API Key. This field is required.

dify_api_base.hint: Dify API Base URL. Default: https://api.dify.ai/v1

dify_api_type.hint: Dify API type. According to Dify docs, supported types are chat, chatflow, agent, workflow.

dify_workflow_output_key.hint: Dify workflow output variable name. Only used when app type is workflow. Default: astrbot_wf_output.

dify_query_input_key.hint: Input variable name for the message text. Default: astrbot_text_query.

coze_api_key.hint: Coze API key for accessing Coze services.

bot_id.hint: Coze bot ID, obtained after creating a bot on the Coze platform.

coze_api_base.hint: Base URL for the Coze API. Default: https://api.coze.cn

auto_save_history.hint: When enabled, Coze manages conversation history. AstrBot's locally saved context will not take effect (read-only), and operations on AstrBot context will not apply. If disabled, AstrBot manages the context.

help.helpText: Don't understand the configuration? See {documentation} or {support}.
